name: icyAI - Icy Tower AI vs. Human
name_original: icyAI - Icy Tower AI vs. Human
description:
Remember Icy Tower? 

icyAI is my recreation of this wonderful game, that is both playable by you or a real AI (artificial intelligence), that you can train yourself. 

What you can do with icyAI:
  •  Easily train an AI by trying different settings with a genetic algorithm (called NEAT). This game lets you unleash 50, 100, 500 (or whatever your machine can handle) individual Harolds at once into the world. They are then free to make their own experiences & you can watch them evolve into better performing individuals, by reproduction, mutation & speciation. 
  • Once you have successfully trained your own AI, you can play against it & see, if it has reached a superhuman level. 
  • This project will help you understand, how neuro-evolution works & will provide you with interesting statistics & graphics along the training-process. 
  • If you just want to relax, play Icy Tower & enjoy the iconic music of the game - go for it. There's no need for the AI. 

See, if you can train a better AI than I managed to do (see how I did), by changing the training parameters.

This is the first game & AI-application, that I have ever made, so I would be super happy, if you were to let me know what you think about this project! :)

Other than than, I hope my creation helps you to relive some good old memories & that you enjoy the simplicity of this amazing game, as much as I do.
